description: This file defines API routes for managing 'trip' entities in a FastAPI application, including endpoints for listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting trips. It uses SQLAlchemy for database interactions and Pydantic for data validation.

classes.name: TripUpdate
classes.description: Schema for updating a trip, with optional fields for name, start_date, and end_date, including validation to prevent blank names.

classes.name: TripListResponse
classes.description: Schema for paginated list response of trips, including total count, limit, offset, and list of TripRead items.

methods.name: Select[tuple[Trip]] _apply_trip_sorting( stmt: Select[tuple[Trip]], *, sort_by: Literal["created_at", "name"] = "created_at", sort_dir: Literal["asc", "desc"] = "desc", )
methods.description: Apply sorting to a SQLAlchemy select statement for trips based on provided sort field and direction.

methods.name: Trip _get_trip_or_404(db: Session, trip_id: uuid.UUID)
methods.description: Retrieve a Trip by ID from the database or raise a 404 HTTP exception if not found.

methods.name: list_trips( db: Session = Depends(get_db), limit: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Maximum number of trips to return"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of trips to skip"), sort_by: Literal["created_at", "name"] = Query( "created_at", description="Sort field", ), sort_dir: Literal["asc", "desc"] = Query( "desc", description="Sort direction", ), )
methods.description: Endpoint to list trips with pagination, sorting options, and total count.

methods.name: TripRead create_trip(payload: TripCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to create a new trip with validation for start and end dates.

methods.name: TripRead get_trip(trip_id: uuid.UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve details of a specific trip by UUID.

methods.name: TripRead update_trip(trip_id: uuid.UUID, payload: TripUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to update fields of an existing trip; only provided fields are changed.

methods.name: Response delete_trip(trip_id: uuid.UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to delete a trip by UUID.

ctags.name: _apply_trip_sorting
ctags.signature: ( stmt: Select[tuple[Trip]], *, sort_by: Literal["created_at", "name"] = "created_at", sort_dir: Literal["asc", "desc"] = "desc", )

ctags.name: _name_not_blank
ctags.pattern: /^    def _name_not_blank(cls, v: str | None) -> str | None:$/

ctags.name: create_trip
ctags.pattern: /^def create_trip(payload: TripCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> TripRead:$/

ctags.name: delete_trip
ctags.pattern: /^def delete_trip(trip_id: uuid.UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> Response:$/

ctags.name: get_trip
ctags.pattern: /^def get_trip(trip_id: uuid.UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> TripRead:$/

ctags.name: items
ctags.pattern: /^    items: list[TripRead] = Field(..., description="Trips in the current page")$/

ctags.name: limit
ctags.pattern: /^    limit: int = Field(..., description="Page size limit used for this response", ge=1, le=100)$/

ctags.name: list_trips
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), limit: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Maximum number of trips to return"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of trips to skip"), sort_by: Literal["created_at", "name"] = Query( "created_at", description="Sort field", ), sort_dir: Literal["asc", "desc"] = Query( "desc", description="Sort direction", ), )

ctags.name: offset
ctags.pattern: /^    offset: int = Field(..., description="Offset used for this response", ge=0)$/

ctags.name: total
ctags.pattern: /^    total: int = Field(..., description="Total number of trips available (ignores pagination)")$/

ctags.name: update_trip
ctags.pattern: /^def update_trip(trip_id: uuid.UUID, payload: TripUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> TripR/
ctags.signature: (trip_id: uuid.UUID, payload: TripUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
